comments_since_last_sample.body: I've never tried the fragrance, only been collecting for a few months.
I have tried only Aqua Fi gio Profumo,and not the original.
I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.
I would love to add ADG to my collection, I don’t have it yet, thanks

I don't need to win the ADG, because a couple of older dudes in my workplace overdid it for me, and I've become a Mont Blanc geek, so I'm really just here to say I appreciate you highlighting Legend Spirit. That's my jam, even though I wish it had more longevity.
I'd like to be entered in the contest. Never tried Acqua di Gio. Here's to getting that bottle!🍀😆
I wanted to buy a full bottle, because I have a Sample and it smelled amazing. On Just one day I became three Compliments! So, I really need a full bottle.
I never owned or smelled the OG AdG, i smelled only flankers like Profumo which i love. I would be very curious of how this one smells in cold weather situation.
I love wearing Acqua di Gio! One of my favorite fresh fragrances!
I’d like to be entered to win the ADG bottle, I really enjoy watching reviews from the channel!
I like to Join the giveaway,i have a mini size ADG" manly clonnes of it like PE'360"Red..exc.
I only tried AdG but would love to wear it more!
I wore adg until I moved to the flankers. I need to revisit the original
Got the profumo enter me,would rock it all the time.

I'd like to be entered into the giveaway. Never smelled the og, only the Profondo & Profumo, so would love to own the one which started it all. 
As always thanks for the opportunity Ash from Gents Scents 🙌🏻🙌🏻
I had a shipmate friend when I was in the navy which he rocked gio as his sig scent . I've always liked the scent just never bought it, maybe I couldn't afford it then
ADG was my first scent as well, my grandparents got it for me when i was 12. Still have a tiny bit left of my original bottle. hope i can win a new one lol.
I've actually never owned it, but would love to try it
Always liked aqua di gio had a few testers but never bought it because I couldn’t cough up the cash and bought cheapies instead.. hoping I can get it finally🙏

I haven't smelled aqua di gio in my life. The reason is that I would like to spend 80 bucks on something else instead of aqua di gio. I am not saying it's a bad scent because I haven't smelled it. But I was thinking that instead of spending on aqua si gio I can spend it on something better than aqua di gio. That's the reason I haven't smelled aqua di gio. It would be great if I get a chance to smell it. And I will be lucky by having a chance of winning the giveaway. Thanks 😊
